alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Dale, Coffee, northeastern Geneva and northwestern Houston Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Glenwood to 8 miles northwest of Fort Rucker to Newton. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 45 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Dothan, Midland City, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Pinckard, Lee, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Napier Field, Mixons Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Curtis and Carl Folsom A/p. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
